name: com.chocola-mint.visual-scripting-plus
description: Quality-of-life extensions to Unity Visual Scripting. Features not just a node search tool, but also other debugging tools as well. Visual Scripting Plus aims to give Unity Visual Scripting much-needed features to actually make it production-ready and competitive against well-known solutions like the Playmaker, and of course Unreal's Blueprint.
author: ChocolaMint (https://github.com/chocola-mint)

samples.description: Contains a demo for VSPlus functions.
